rooms.name: Entry Vestibule
rooms.description: Serves as the entrance space with minimal storage and a Vastu-compliant positioning.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Combines kitchen and living space for a contemporary feel. Features modern appliances, open shelving and Vastu-compliant north-eastern placement of the dining area.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An inviting central courtyard that provides natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu principles. Acts as a transitional space between the indoor areas.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A compact yet functional gym area designed to maximize space efficiency and include essential workout equipment while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-equipped bathroom with necessary fixtures and drainage in compliance with local building norms.

rooms.name: Closet/Storage
rooms.description: Compact closet area integrated within the living space for extra storage, considering budget constraints.

openings.description: Primary entry point with direct access to the open-plan living area.

openings.location: Multiple across facade and courtyard walls
openings.description: Large windows to enhance natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

additional_info.vastu_principles: Incorporated in the positioning of key rooms and openings to ensure optimal energy flow.
additional_info.building_norms: Compliant with local Indian building standards for residential penthouse studios.
